title: Incremental compilation ICE "forcing query with already existing `DepNode` …" using `ouroboros`

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

body:
Reproduces on this change
```diff
/*
[dependencies]
ouroboros = "0.15.5"
*/
use ouroboros::*;

type F<'a> = fn(&'a ());

#[self_referencing]
struct S<'a> {
    o: Box<F<'a>>,
    #[borrows(o)]
-   r: &'this u8,
+   r: &'this str,
}
fn main() {
    println!("");
}
```
[try it out online here](https://www.rustexplorer.com/b#%2F*%0A%5Bdependencies%5D%0Aouroboros%20%3D%20%220.15.5%22%0A*%2F%0Ause%20ouroboros%3A%3A*%3B%0A%0Atype%20F%3C'a%3E%20%3D%20fn(%26'a%20())%3B%0A%0A%23%5Bself_referencing%5D%0Astruct%20S%3C'a%3E%20%7B%0A%20%20%20%20o%3A%20Box%3CF%3C'a%3E%3E%2C%0A%20%20%20%20%23%5Bborrows(o)%5D%0A%20%20%20%20r%3A%20%26'this%20u8%2C%20%2F%2F%20Run%2C%20change%20this%20line%20to%20%60%26'this%20str%60%2C%20run%20again.%0A%7D%0Afn%20main()%20%7B%0A%20%20%20%20println!(%22%22)%3B%0A%7D%0A)
```
   Compiling playground v0.1.0 (/home/explorer/playground)
thread 'rustc' panicked at 'forcing query with already existing `DepNode`
```

Searching the error on open issues only shows [this issue](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/83085), but I’m not sure whether consts are involved here, too. Ouroboros does generate quite some code… someone (maybe me myself at a later date) would need to expand the macro and search for the relevant bit that causes the ICE. I.e. @rustbot label E-needs-mcve. With a reduced example, we can better judge if this could be a duplicate, and we could also more easily check whether this is a regression, and if yes, where/when.

@rustbot label A-incr-comp
